short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly find synonyms for the selected word on Thesaurus.com.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight a word in any page and right click on it. This addon creates a new context menu item that allows you to look up synonyms for the highlighted word on Thesaurus.com
